refnamediv.refpurpose: Changes the name of old_name to new_name wherever it occurs in the database.

refsection.para: Changes the name of old_name to new_name. This will also change any references to old_name that may occur in other combinations in the database. If the -f variation of the command is used, all old_name new_name pairings are read from the mapping_file and processed as previously stated.

info.title: Change the name of an object everywhere it occurs in the database.

example.para: Changes the name of shapea to shapeb everywhere it occurs in the database.

info.title: This example shows a simple mapping file.

example.literallayout: # this line is a comment old_name new_name foo bar # another comment, replacing foo with bar bad_name good_name
